com.thinkaurelius.titan.core
Interface TitanVertex

All Superinterfaces:
com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element, TitanElement, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
All Known Subinterfaces:
TitanEdge, TitanKey, TitanLabel, TitanProperty, TitanRelation, TitanType
public interface TitanVertex
extends TitanElement, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex

TitanVertex is the basic unit of a TitanGraph. It extends the functionality provided by Blueprint's Vertex by helper and convenience methods.

Author:
Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)

Method Detail

addEdge

TitanEdge addEdge(TitanLabel label,
                  TitanVertex vertex)
Creates a new edge incident on this vertex. Creates and returns a new TitanEdge of the specified label with this vertex being the outgoing vertex and the given vertex being the incoming vertex.

Parameters:
label - label of the edge to be created
vertex - incoming vertex of the edge to be created
Returns:
new edge

addEdge

TitanEdge addEdge(String label,
                  TitanVertex vertex)
Creates a new edge incident on this vertex. Creates and returns a new TitanEdge of the specified label with this vertex being the outgoing vertex and the given vertex being the incoming vertex.
Automatically creates the edge label if it does not exist and automatic creation of types is enabled. Otherwise, this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
label - label of the edge to be created
vertex - incoming vertex of the edge to be created
Returns:
new edge

addProperty

TitanProperty addProperty(TitanKey key,
                          Object attribute)
Creates a new property for this vertex and given key with the specified attribute. Creates and returns a new TitanProperty for the given key on this vertex with the specified object being the attribute.

Parameters:
key - key of the property to be created
attribute - attribute of the property to be created
Returns:
New property
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute does not match the data type of the property key.

addProperty

TitanProperty addProperty(String key,
                          Object attribute)
Creates a new property for this vertex and given key with the specified attribute. Creates and returns a new TitanProperty for the given key on this vertex with the specified object being the attribute.
Automatically creates the property key if it does not exist and automatic creation of types is enabled. Otherwise, this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
key - key of the property to be created
attribute - attribute of the property to be created
Returns:
New property
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute does not match the data type of the property key.

setProperty

void setProperty(String key,
                 Object value)
Add a property with the given key and value to this vertex. If the key is functional, then a possibly existing value is replaced. If it is not functional, then a new property is added.

Specified by:
setProperty in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element
Parameters:
key - the string key of the property
value - the object value o the property
See Also:
addProperty(String, Object)

removeProperty

Object removeProperty(String key)
Removes all properties with the given key from this vertex.

Specified by:
removeProperty in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element
Parameters:
key - the key of the properties to remove from the element
Returns:
the object value (or null) associated with that key prior to removal if the key is functional, or an Iterable over all values (which may be empty) if it is not functional

query

TitanQuery query()
Starts a new TitanQuery for this vertex. Initializes and returns a new TitanQuery centered on this vertex.

Specified by:
query in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
Returns:
New TitanQuery for this vertex
See Also:
TitanQuery

getProperty

Object getProperty(TitanKey key)
Retrieves the attribute value for the only property of the specified property key incident on this vertex. This method call expects that there is at most one property of the specified TitanKey incident on this vertex. If there could be multiple properties (i.e. for non-functional property keys), then use getProperties(TitanKey)

Parameters:
key - key of the property for which to retrieve the attribute value
Returns:
Attribute value of the property with the specified type or null if no such property exists
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if more than one property of the specified key are incident on this vertex.

getProperty

Object getProperty(String key)
Retrieves the attribute value for the only property of the specified property key incident on this vertex. This method call expects that there is at most one property of the specified TitanKey incident on this vertex. If there could be multiple properties (i.e. for non-functional property keys), then use getProperties(String)

Specified by:
getProperty in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element
Parameters:
key - key name of the property for which to retrieve the attribute value
Returns:
Attribute value of the property with the specified type or null if no such property exists
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if more than one property of the specified key are incident on this vertex.

Returns:
Attribute value of the property with the specified type

Returns:

getProperties

Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties()
Returns an iterable over all properties incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All properties incident on this vertex are returned irrespective of their key.

Returns:
Iterable over all properties incident on this vertex

getProperties

Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties(TitanKey key)
Returns an iterable over all properties of the specified property key incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All returned properties are of the specified key.

Parameters:
key - TitanKey of the returned properties
Returns:
Iterable over all properties of the specified key incident on this vertex

getProperties

Iterable<TitanProperty> getProperties(String key)
Returns an iterable over all properties of the specified property key incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the properties are returned. All returned properties are of the specified key.

Parameters:
key - key of the returned properties
Returns:
Iterable over all properties of the specified key incident on this vertex

getTitanEdges

Iterable<TitanEdge> getTitanEdges(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction d,
                                  TitanLabel... labels)
Returns an iterable over all edges of the specified edge label in the given direction incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned. All returned edges have the given label and the direction of the edge from the perspective of this vertex matches the specified direction.

Parameters:
labels - label of the returned edges
d - Direction of the returned edges with respect to this vertex
Returns:
Iterable over all edges with the given label and direction incident on this vertex

getEdges

Iterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge> getEdges(com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction d,
                                                 String... labels)
Returns an iterable over all edges of the specified edge label in the given direction incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned. All returned edges have the given label and the direction of the edge from the perspective of this vertex matches the specified direction.

Specified by:
getEdges in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Vertex
Parameters:
labels - label of the returned edges
d - Direction of the returned edges with respect to this vertex
Returns:
Iterable over all edges with the given label and direction incident on this vertex

getEdges

Iterable<TitanEdge> getEdges()
Returns an iterable over all edges incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the edges are returned.

Returns:
Iterable over all edges incident on this vertex

getRelations

Iterable<TitanRelation> getRelations()
Returns an iterable over all relations incident on this vertex. There is no guarantee concerning the order in which the relations are returned. Note, that this method potentially returns both TitanEdge and TitanProperty.

Returns:
Iterable over all properties and edges incident on this vertex.

getEdgeCount

long getEdgeCount()
Returns the number of edges incident on this vertex. Returns the total number of edges irrespective of label and direction. Note, that loop edges, i.e. edges with identical in- and outgoing vertex, are counted twice.

Returns:
The number of edges incident on this vertex.

getPropertyCount

long getPropertyCount()
Returns the number of properties incident on this vertex. Returns the total number of properties irrespective of key.

Returns:
The number of properties incident on this vertex.

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Checks whether this vertex has at least one incident edge. In other words, it returns getEdgeCount()>0, but might be implemented more efficiently.

Returns:
true, if this vertex has at least one incident edge, else false
